references.paper_title: Structured3d: A large photo-realistic dataset for structured 3d modeling
references.reason: This paper introduces the Structure3D dataset, a synthetic dataset that provides a large collection of photo-realistic images with detailed 3D structural annotations, which the current study uses for training and evaluation.

references.paper_title: Learning to reconstruct 3d non-cuboid room layout from a single rgb image
references.reason: This paper is important as it is a strong baseline and the single-view approach on which the current paper builds its f1, using HRNet from this paper to extract 2D plane p, line l, and predict 3D plane normal n and offset d from the input single view.

references.paper_title: Grounding image matching in 3d with mast3r
references.reason: MASt3R further extends DUSt3R, enabling it to estimate camera poses at a metric scale from sparse image inputs and enabling improvements when compared with DUSt3R, not only in traditional multi-view datasets, but also in sparse-view datasets.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
